service.title: ANIMATION
service.desc: 需提供中英文字Animation is what we do best, whether it's 3D or 2D, photorealistic or stylized, characters or products, we breathe a soul into flat concepts; presenting the highest quality animation work.

children.title: ANIMATION
children.text: Most interns were new to Unreal, we guided them through VP pipeline/workflow from beginner's level, including skills such as workspace introductions, project setups, function essentials and scene creation.
